SALESFORCE HELP

DATA CLOUD
Create Your Core Activations in Data Cloud

Let’s review the steps for creating your core activations in Data Cloud.

Create a segment in Data Cloud at the Individual level that represents your full audience as active segment members. Then create a Unified Individual segment.
IMPLEMENTATION PATTERN	DATA CLOUD SEGMENTS
Core Audience Model	
Full Individual audience
Full Unified Individual audience

Collective Core Audience model	
Full Individual audience
Full Unified Individual audience
Depending on your data strategy, a marketer creates one or more Data Cloud activations to Marketing Cloud Engagement based on each full audience segment.
IMPLEMENTATION PATTERN	DATA CLOUD SEGMENTS	EXAMPLE DATA CLOUD ACTIVATIONS
Core Audience Model	
Full Individual audience
Full Unified Individual audience
	
MC Core All Individuals
MC Core All Unified Individuals

Collective Core Audience model	
Full Individual audience
Full Unified Individual audience
	
MC Individuals Identity & Consent
MC Individuals Subscriptions & Preferences
MC Individuals Demographics & Psychographics
MC Individuals ecommerce Data
MC Unified Individuals Demographics & Psychographics
MC Unified Individuals ecommerce
